mapper.select:
select t.theatername theaterName, h.hallname hallName, t.address address
from theater t, hall h where t.theater_no = h.theater_no

select t.theatername theaterName, h.hallname hallName, t.address address
from theater t, hall h where t.theater_no = h.theater_no and t.theatername like '%'#{hKey}'%'

select t.theater_no theaterNo, theatername, postcode, address, address2, phone, homepage, logopath, hallname, hall_no hallNo from theater t, hall h where t.theater_no= h.theater_no order by theaterNo desc, hall_no desc

select t.theater_no theaterNo, theatername, postcode, address, address2, phone, homepage, logopath, hallname, hall_no hallNo from theater t, hall h where t.theater_no= h.theater_no and hall_no= #{hallNo}
select count(*) from hall h, theater t where t.theater_no= h.theater_no

select rn, theatername, hallname, postcode, address, address2, phone, homepage from (select rownum rn, theatername, hallname, postcode, address, address2, phone, homepage from (select theatername, hallname, postcode, address, address2, phone, homepage from hall h, theater t where t.theater_no= h.theater_no order by t.theater_no desc) o) r where rn between #{startRnum} and #{endRnum}
